Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its high-quality features and potential impact on your business, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This special offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste for excellence and your commitment to achieving unparalleled success. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your business growth. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
